name: ThirtyOne
description:
So far mobile only. We're working on a PC port!

Now also available for iPhone

In this card game your goal is to collect cards worth 31 points by swapping your cards with the ones on the table. But watch out for your opponents - they want to get a good hand as fast as possible as well. What colors do they collect? And will you do if the cards you need don't end up on the table? Every tactic is quickly adjusted and with a little bit of vision and luck you can score more points than the other players!

The rules are simple and the rounds are quick and fun. The player who defends his three lives the longest, wins!

Also known as Blitz, Schwimmen, Knack or Schnauz.
